article_title: It’s a race: Nikki Haley, Vincent Sheheen sign up for SC rematch
article_text: Republican Gov. Nikki Haley and Democratic state Sen. Vincent Sheheen signed up Tuesday for another fight to run South Carolina.

Nikki Haley and Democratic state Sen. Vincent Sheheen signed up Tuesday for another fight to run South Carolina.
